content: **chicky lace socks super easy to knit ** i am very happy to share this free pattern for lace socks with you the socks are super easy to knit and perfect for beginning and advanced knitters of lace patterns within a few rounds you know the pattern by heart and you can easily watch your favorite series while knitting **sizes** eu sizes 37-41 us sizes 6 5-9 5 female uk sizes 4-7 **materials** you can choose any fingering sock yarn you like with a gauge of 28 stitches x 40 row you can also choose a sock yarn with a different gauge for instance 30 stitches x 42 row in that case the socks will be a little smaller so please check along the way if the size is right **i wish you lots of knitting fun **
